attributes.action: All NHS staff to be awarded a Long Service & Good Conduct Medal.
attributes.additional_details:
Having been a uniformed individual for part of my working life, I look on with much bemusement at how service like the Police, Fire & Armed Forces personnel are awarded a long service and good conduct medal, whereas in the NHS, Doctors, Nurses, Techs, Porters and so on receive nothing at all.
I wish to petition you, our Government and attempt to change this strange anomaly of process, on a personal note we receive more recognition for working on Covid-19 projects within Motorsport than our front line staff do working with it.
attributes.background: Not just for this time of National and International crisis and what is a wave of public out pouring of gratitude to all grades within the NHS, award a long service and good conduct medal for all eligible staff at some point in service, as the case with other Government agencies.

rejection.details:
We think this is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587162

If you'd like something different, such as a shorter service requirement, you could start a petition asking for that.
